variable.name: SUBJID
variable.description: De-identified Subject ID
variable.comment: DNHS variable

variable.name: phx_NU1
variable.description: Did participant give date of birth?
variable.comment: Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_age
variable.description: Current age.
variable.comment: PhenX variables: PX010101010100 - PX010101010300, PX010101020000 - PX010101020100, and interview date were combined post - collection to create current age at interview. Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_ETHNIC
variable.description: Do you consider yourself Hispanic or Latino?
variable.comment: Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_HISP_1
variable.description: Groups best representing participant's Hispanic origin or ancestry. Multiple answers allowed. (SELECTION #1)
variable.comment: PhenX variables: PX010501020000 - PX010501021100 were combined post - collection into a single multi - category variable. Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_RUACE_
variable.description: Specify race further if for phx_RACE_1- phx_RACE_10, the participant answered: Other Pacific Islander, Other Asian, or Some Other Race
variable.comment: Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_RACE_1
variable.description: Race of participant. Multiple answers allowed. (SELECTION #1)
variable.comment: PhenX variables: PX010601010100 - PX010601011600 were combined into a multi - category variable. Multiple answers per participant were stored in several variables. Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_RACE_2
variable.description: Race of participant. Multiple answers allowed. (SELECTION #2)
variable.comment: PhenX variables: PX010601010100 - PX010601011600 were combined into a multi - category variable. Multiple answers per participant were stored in several variables. Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_RACE_3
variable.description: Race of participant. Multiple answers allowed. (SELECTION #3)
variable.comment: PhenX variables: PX010601010100 - PX010601011600 were combined into a multi - category variable. Multiple answers per participant were stored in several variables. Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_GENDER
variable.description: Gender of participant.
variable.comment: Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_NU2
variable.description: Current marital status of participant.
variable.comment: Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_U25
variable.description: Current educational attainment of participant.
variable.comment: Telephone-administered question.
variable.value: ASSOCIATE DEGREE: OCCUPATIONAL TECHNICAL OR VOCATIONAL PROGRAM
BACHELOR'S DEGREE (EXAMPLE: BA AB BS BBA)
MASTER'S DEGREE (EXAMPLE: MA MS MEng MEd MBA)
PROFESSIONAL SCHOOL DEGREE (EXAMPLE: MD DDS DVM JD)

variable.name: phx_UU30_
variable.description: Specify other employment status
variable.comment: Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_U30_1
variable.description: Current employment status of participant. Multiple answers allowed. (SELECTION #1)
variable.comment: PhenX variable PX011301010000: Multiple answers per participant were stored in several variables. Added Coding: 98=DON'T KNOW; 99=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.
variable.value: ONLY TEMPORARILY LAID OFF SICK LEAVE OR MATERNITY LEAVE

variable.name: phx_U30_2
variable.description: Current employment status of participant. Multiple answers allowed. (SELECTION #2)
variable.comment: PhenX variable PX011301010000: Multiple answers per participant were stored in several variables. Added Coding: 98=DON'T KNOW; 99=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.
variable.value: ONLY TEMPORARILY LAID OFF SICK LEAVE OR MATERNITY LEAVE

variable.name: phx_U30_3
variable.description: Current employment status of participant. Multiple answers allowed. (SELECTION #3)
variable.comment: PhenX variable PX011301010000: Multiple answers per participant were stored in several variables. Added Coding: 98=DON'T KNOW; 99=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.
variable.value: ONLY TEMPORARILY LAID OFF SICK LEAVE OR MATERNITY LEAVE

variable.name: phx_U31
variable.description: Are you covered by health insurance or some other kind of health care plan?
variable.comment: Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_U32_1
variable.description: What kind of health insurance or health care coverage do you have? Multiple answers allowed. (SELECTION #1)
variable.comment: PhenX variables: PX011501020100 - PX011501021300 were combined into a multi - category variable. Multiple answers per participant were stored in several variables. Added Coding: 12=Other (SPECIFY) Telephone-administered question.
variable.value: SINGLE SERVICE PLAN (E.G. DENTAL VISION PRESCRIPTIONS)

variable.name: phx_U32_2
variable.description: What kind of health insurance or health care coverage do you have? Multiple answers allowed. (SELECTION #2)
variable.comment: PhenX variables: PX011501020100 - PX011501021300 were combined into a multi - category variable. Multiple answers per participant were stored in several variables. Added Coding: 12=Other (SPECIFY) Telephone-administered question.
variable.value: SINGLE SERVICE PLAN (E.G. DENTAL VISION PRESCRIPTIONS)

variable.name: phx_U32_3
variable.description: What kind of health insurance or health care coverage do you have? Multiple answers allowed. (SELECTION #3)
variable.comment: PhenX variables: PX011501020100 - PX011501021300 were combined into a multi - category variable. Multiple answers per participant were stored in several variables. Added Coding: 12=Other (SPECIFY) Telephone-administered question.
variable.value: SINGLE SERVICE PLAN (E.G. DENTAL VISION PRESCRIPTIONS)

variable.name: phx_U32_4
variable.description: What kind of health insurance or health care coverage do you have? Multiple answers allowed. (SELECTION #4)
variable.comment: PhenX variables: PX011501020100 - PX011501021300 were combined into a multi - category variable. Multiple answers per participant were stored in several variables. Added Coding: 12=Other (SPECIFY) Telephone-administered question.
variable.value: SINGLE SERVICE PLAN (E.G. DENTAL VISION PRESCRIPTIONS)

variable.name: phx_U32_5
variable.description: What kind of health insurance or health care coverage do you have? Multiple answers allowed. (SELECTION #5)
variable.comment: PhenX variables: PX011501020100 - PX011501021300 were combined into a multi - category variable. Multiple answers per participant were stored in several variables. Added Coding: 12=Other (SPECIFY) Telephone-administered question.
variable.value: SINGLE SERVICE PLAN (E.G. DENTAL VISION PRESCRIPTIONS)

variable.name: phx_NUU32_
variable.description: Specify health insurance if participant selected: Other
variable.comment: Specify code 12 (other) used here Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_Z1_life
variable.description: Ever used sedatives illicitly.
variable.comment: Split the PhenX variable PX031101010000 into 3 parts. This is part 1. Added coding: 1=Yes; 2=No; 8=DON'T KNOW; 9=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_Z1bwch
variable.description: Did participant specify the kinds of sedatives used illicitly?
variable.comment: Split the PhenX variable PX031101010000 into 3 parts. This is part 2. Added coding: 1=Gave response; 8=DON'T KNOW; 9=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_Z1BOE_
variable.description: Participant's specification of the kinds of sedatives used illicitly. (VERBATIM RESPONSE)
variable.comment: Split the PhenX variable PX031101010000 into 3 parts. This is part 3. Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_Z2_life
variable.description: Ever used tranquilizers or anti-anxiety drugs illicitly.
variable.comment: Split the PhenX variable PX031101020000 into 3 parts. This is part 1. Added coding: 1=Yes; 2=No; 8=DON'T KNOW; 9=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_Z2bwch
variable.description: Did participant specify the kinds of tranquilizers or anti-anxiety drugs used illicitly?
variable.comment: Split the PhenX variable PX031101020000 into 3 parts. This is part 2. Added coding: 1=Gave response; 8=DON'T KNOW; 9=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_Z2BOE_
variable.description: Participant's specification of the kinds of tranquilizers or anti-anxiety drugs used illicitly. (VERBATIM RESPONSE)
variable.comment: Split the PhenX variable PX031101020000 into 3 parts. This is part 3. Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_Z3_life
variable.description: Ever used painkillers illicitly.
variable.comment: Split the PhenX variable PX031101030000 into 3 parts. This is part 1. Added coding: 1=Yes; 2=No; 8=DON'T KNOW; 9=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_Z3bwch
variable.description: Did participant specify the kinds of painkillers used illicitly?
variable.comment: Split the PhenX variable PX031101030000 into 3 parts. This is part 2. Added coding: 1=Gave response; 8=DON'T KNOW; 9=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_Z3BOE_
variable.description: Participant's specification of the kinds of painkillers used illicitly. (VERBATIM RESPONSE)
variable.comment: Split the PhenX variable PX031101030000 into 3 parts. This is part 3. Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_Z4_life
variable.description: Ever used stimulants illicitly.
variable.comment: Split the PhenX variable PX031101040000 into 3 parts. This is part 1. Added coding: 1=Yes; 2=No; 8=DON'T KNOW; 9=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_Z4bwch
variable.description: Did participant specify the kinds of stimulants used illicitly?
variable.comment: Split the PhenX variable PX031101040000 into 3 parts. This is part 2. Added coding: 1=Gave response; 8=DON'T KNOW; 9=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.description: Participant's specification of the kinds of stimulants used illicitly. (VERBATIM RESPONSE)
variable.comment: Split the PhenX variable PX031101040000 into 3 parts. This is part 3. Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_Z5_life
variable.description: Ever used marijuana, hash, THC, or grass illicitly.
variable.comment: Split the PhenX variable PX031101050000 into 3 parts. This is part 1. Added coding: 1=Yes; 2=No; 8=DON'T KNOW; 9=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_Z5bwch
variable.description: Did participant specify the kinds of marijuana, hash, THC, or grass used illicitly?
variable.comment: Split the PhenX variable PX031101050000 into 3 parts. This is part 2. Added coding: 1=Gave response; 8=DON'T KNOW; 9=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.description: Participant's specification of the kinds of marijuana, hash, THC, or grass used illicitly. (VERBATIM RESPONSE)
variable.comment: Split the PhenX variable PX031101050000 into 3 parts. This is part 3. Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_Z6_life
variable.description: Ever used cocaine or crack.
variable.comment: Split the PhenX variable PX031101060000 into 3 parts. This is part 1. Added coding: 1=Yes; 2=No; 8=DON'T KNOW; 9=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_Z6wch
variable.description: Did participant specify which kinds of cocaine or crack they used?
variable.comment: Split the PhenX variable PX031101060000 into 3 parts. This is part 2. Added coding: 1=Gave response; 8=DON'T KNOW; 9=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_Z6OE_
variable.description: Participant's specification of which kinds of cocaine or crack they used. (VERBATIM RESPONSE)
variable.comment: Split the PhenX variable PX031101060000 into 3 parts. This is part 3. Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_Z7_life
variable.description: Ever used hallucinogens.
variable.comment: Split the PhenX variable PX031101070000 into 3 parts. This is part 1. Added coding: 1=Yes; 2=No; 8=DON'T KNOW; 9=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_Z7wch
variable.description: Did participant specify which kinds of hallucinogens they used?
variable.comment: Split the PhenX variable PX031101070000 into 3 parts. This is part 2. Added coding: 1=Gave response; 8=DON'T KNOW; 9=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.description: Participant's specification of which kinds of hallucinogens they used. (VERBATIM RESPONSE)
variable.comment: Split the PhenX variable PX031101070000 into 3 parts. This is part 3. Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_Z8_life
variable.description: Ever used inhalants or solvents.
variable.comment: Split the PhenX variable PX031101080000 into 3 parts. This is part 1. Added coding: 1=Yes; 2=No; 8=DON'T KNOW; 9=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_Z8wch
variable.description: Did participant specify which kinds of inhalants or solvents they used?
variable.comment: Split the PhenX variable PX031101080000 into 3 parts. This is part 2. Added coding: 1=Gave response; 8=DON'T KNOW; 9=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.description: Participant's specification of which kinds of inhalants or solvents they used. (VERBATIM RESPONSE)
variable.comment: Split the PhenX variable PX031101080000 into 3 parts. This is part 3. Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_Z9_life
variable.description: Ever used heroin.
variable.comment: PhenX variable PX031101090000 was coded as 'Yes' or 'No', rather than as a verbatim response. Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_Z10_life
variable.description: Ever used other medicines, drugs or substances illicitly.
variable.comment: Split the PhenX variable PX031101100000 into 3 parts. This is part 1. Added coding: 1=Yes; 2=No; 8=DON'T KNOW; 9=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_Z10bwch
variable.description: Did participant specify the kinds of other medicines, drugs, or substances that were used illicitly?
variable.comment: Split the PhenX variable PX031101100000 into 3 parts. This is part 2. Added coding: 1=Gave response; 8=DON'T KNOW; 9=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_Z10BOE_
variable.description: Participant's specification of the kinds of other medicines, drugs, or substances that were used illicitly. (VERBATIM RESPONSE)
variable.comment: Split the PhenX variable PX031101100000 into 3 parts. This is part 3. Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_Z1C
variable.description: Frequency of illicit use of sedatives during the past 30 days.
variable.comment: PhenX Variables PX031301010000 - PX031301010100 were combined into a single variable. New coding: 98=DON'T KNOW; 99=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_Z2C
variable.description: Frequency of illicit use of tranquilizers or anti- anxiety drugs during the past 30 days.
variable.comment: PhenX Variables PX031301020000 - PX031301020100 were combined into a single variable. New coding: 98=DON'T KNOW; 99=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_Z3C
variable.description: Frequency of illicit use of painkillers during the past 30 days.
variable.comment: PhenX Variables PX031301030000 - PX031301030100 were combined into a single variable. New coding: 98=DON'T KNOW; 99=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_Z4C
variable.description: Frequency of illicit use of stimulants during the past 30 days.
variable.comment: PhenX Variables PX031301040000 - PX031301040100 were combined into a single variable. New coding: 98=DON'T KNOW; 99=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_Z5C
variable.description: Frequency of illicit use of marijuana or hashish during the past 30 days.
variable.comment: PhenX Variables PX031301050000 - PX031301050100 were combined into a single variable. New coding: 98=DON'T KNOW; 99=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_Z6A
variable.description: Frequency of use of cocaine or crack during the past 30 days.
variable.comment: PhenX Variables PX031301060000 - PX031301070100 were combined into a single variable. Answer Choices were also changed so that use of crack and cocaine are not recorded separately. New coding: 98=DON'T KNOW; 99=REFUSED Telephone-administered question. Question changed to facilitate mode of interview.

variable.name: phx_Z7A
variable.description: Frequency of use of hallucinogens during the past 30 days.
variable.comment: PhenX Variables PX031301080000 - PX031301080100 were combined into a single variable. New coding: 98=DON'T KNOW; 99=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_Z8A
variable.description: Frequency of use of any inhalant for kicks or to get high during the past 30 days.
variable.comment: PhenX Variables PX031301090000 - PX031301090100 were combined into a single variable. New coding: 98=DON'T KNOW; 99=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_Z9A
variable.description: Frequency of use of heroin during the past 30 days.
variable.comment: PhenX Variables PX031301100000 - PX031301100100 were combined into a single variable. New coding: 98=DON'T KNOW; 99=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_Z10C
variable.description: Frequency of illicit use of other medicines, drugs, or substances during the past 30 days.
variable.comment: PhenX Variables PX031301110000 - PX031301110100 were combined into a single variable. New coding: 98=DON'T KNOW; 99=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_ND16
variable.description: Did your mother, father, full-blooded sisters, full-blooded brothers, daughters, or sons ever have a heart attack or myocardial infarction?
variable.comment: Added coding: 9=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_D17A
variable.description: Did your mother ever have a heart attack?
variable.comment: PhenX variable PX040101020100 was split into two parts: the first part asked "Did your mother have a heart attack?" Added coding: 9=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_D18A
variable.description: Age of participant's mother when her first heart attack occurred.
variable.comment: PhenX variable PX040101020100 was split into two parts: the 2nd part asked "How old was she when the first heart attack occurred?" Added coding: 4=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_D17B
variable.description: Did your father ever have a heart attack?
variable.comment: PhenX variable PX040101020200 was split into two parts: the first part asked "Did your father have a heart attack?" Added coding: 9=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_D18B
variable.description: Age of participant's father when his first heart attack occurred.
variable.comment: PhenX variable PX040101020200 was split into two parts: the 2nd part asked "How old was he when the first heart attack occurred?" Added coding: 4=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_D17C
variable.description: Did your sister ever have a heart attack?
variable.comment: PhenX variable PX040101020300 was split into two parts: the first part asked "Did your sister have a heart attack?" Added coding: 9=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_D18C
variable.description: Age of participant's sister when her first heart attack occurred.
variable.comment: PhenX variable PX040101020300 was split into two parts: the 2nd part asked "How old was she when the first heart attack occurred?" Added coding: 4=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_D17D
variable.description: Did your brother ever have a heart attack?
variable.comment: PhenX variable PX040101020600 was split into two parts: the first part asked "Did your brother have a heart attack?" Added coding: 9=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_D18D
variable.description: Age of participant's brother when his first heart attack occurred.
variable.comment: PhenX variable PX040101020600 was split into two parts: the 2nd part asked "How old was he when the first heart attack occurred?" Added coding: 4=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_D17E
variable.description: Did your daughter ever have a heart attack?
variable.comment: PhenX variable PX040101020900 was split into two parts: the first part asked "Did your daughter have a heart attack?" Added coding: 9=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_D18E
variable.description: Age of participant's daughter when her first heart attack occurred.
variable.comment: PhenX variable PX040101020900 was split into two parts: the 2nd part asked "How old was she when the first heart attack occurred?" Added coding: 4=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_D17F
variable.description: Did your son ever have a heart attack?
variable.comment: PhenX variable PX040101021100 was split into two parts: the first part asked "Did your son have a heart attack?" Added coding: 9=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_D18F
variable.description: Age of participant's son when his first heart attack occurred.
variable.comment: PhenX variable PX040101021100 was split into two parts: the 2nd part asked "How old was he when the first heart attack occurred?" Added coding: 4=REFUSED Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_ND1
variable.description: Would you say that in general your health is: [READ CHOICES]
variable.comment: Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_ND2
variable.description: Now thinking about your physical health which includes physical illness and injury for how many days during the past 30 days was your physical health not good?
variable.comment: PhenX variable PX180301020000-PX180301020100 were combined into a single variable. Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_ND3
variable.description: Now thinking about your mental health which includes stress depression and problems with emotions for how many days during the past 30 days was your mental health not good?
variable.comment: PhenX variable PX180301030000-PX180301030100 were combined into a single variable. Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_ND4
variable.description: During the past 30 days for about how many days did poor physical or mental health keep you from doing your usual activities such as self-care work or recreation?
variable.comment: PhenX variable PX180301040000-PX180301040100 were combined into a single variable. Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_DSCORE
variable.description: CREATE A SCORING VARIABLE. Sum the number of unhealthy days from phx_ND2 and phx_ND3.
variable.comment: PhenX variables PX180301020000 and PX180301030000 were summed to derive this score. Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_u10
variable.description: Annual household income last year.
variable.comment: Related to PhenX Variables PX011101010000-PX011101060000, but asked in a single question where participants can choose a range of incomes. Telephone-administered question.

variable.name: phx_const_projwts
variable.description: Sampling weights for participants with survey data and who are still living in Detroit at the time of the W4 interview. These weights sum up to the Detroit population of adults (18 yrs and older) in 2010 (n=531,551).
variable.comment: DNHS variable This sampling weight variable contains a missing value (.) for participants who were not residents of Detroit at the time of the W4 interview. Results from an analysis of the raw survey sample (n=845) without weights may not be representative of the Detroit population.

variable.name: phx_const_sampwts
variable.description: Sampling weights for participants with survey data and who are still living in Detroit at the time of the W4 interview. These weights sum up to the total number of study participants with survey data and who are still living in Detroit at the time of the W4 interview (n=791).
variable.comment: DNHS variable This sampling weight variable contains a missing value (.) for participants who were not residents of Detroit at the time of the W4 interview. Results from an analysis of the raw survey sample (n=845) without weights may not be representative of the Detroit population.

variable.name: phx_gwas_const_projwts
variable.description: Sampling weights for participants with both survey and GWAS data and who are still living in Detroit at the time of the W4 interview. These weights sum up to the Detroit population of adults (18 yrs and older) in 2010 (n=531,551).
variable.comment: DNHS variable This sampling weight variable contains a missing value (.) for participants who were not residents of Detroit at the time of the W4 interview. Results from an analysis of the raw survey and GWAS sample (n=507) without weights may not be representative of the Detroit population.

variable.name: phx_gwas_const_sampwts
variable.description: Sampling weights for participants with both survey and GWAS data and who are still living in Detroit at the time of the W4 interview. These weights sum up to the total number of study participants with both survey and GWAS data and who are still living in Detroit at the time of the W4 interview (n=473).
variable.comment: DNHS variable This sampling weight variable contains a missing value (.) for participants who were not residents of Detroit at the time of the W4 interview. Results from an analysis of the raw survey and GWAS sample (n=507) without weights may not be representative of the Detroit population.
